summary: Capitan Marvel: Kevin Feige ribadisce che sarà un origin movie completamente diverso
title: Capitan Marvel: Kevin Feige ribadisce che sarà un origin movie completamente diverso
body:
Capitan Marvel: Kevin Feige ribadisce che sarà un origin movie completamente diverso

Ieri sera Kevin Feige ha ricevuto un premio per il suo enorme contributo al mondo dell’intrattentimento con quello che ha fatto con il Marvel Cinematic Universe, e in effetti va detto che con Iron Man del 2008 ha completamente stravolta il concetto di serialità all’interno del gergo cinematografico, portandolo ad un livello successivo. Cosa che può piacere o meno, ma rimane il fatto che Feige ha…

View On WordPress

WHY IS THE FACE PRINT SO HIT AND MISS
Usually the female characters have a good likeness
summary: I looked at the Captain Marvel preview again and dear god fix the face don’t do another Infinity War Cap fail FOR THE LOVE OF...
body:
I looked at the Captain Marvel preview again and dear god fix the face don’t do another Infinity War Cap fail FOR THE LOVE OF GOD SHE’S THE MAIN CHARACTER WHY DOES SHE NOT HAVE EVEN A PASSING RESEMBLANCE TO THE ACTRESS?!


I feel like I’m going crazy. Nothing of the figure’s facial features remotely resemble Brie Larson’s.

blog.name: colinfordcentral
blog.title: Colin Ford Central
blog.description:
Known for his role as Sam Winchester in Supernatural or Joe Mcalister in Under the Dome. 
Colin Ford is 22 years old actor currently working on a Netflix series called Daybreak. On this page you'll find the latest news on your favorite actor so make sure to subscribe ! 
2013

summary:
Colin Ford will be part of “Daybreak”, a 10 episodes TV Show, that will be available on Netflix.  
“Daybreak finds 17-year-old...
caption:
Colin Ford will be part of “Daybreak”, a 10 episodes TV Show, that will be available on Netflix.

“Daybreak finds 17-year-old high school outcast Josh (Colin Ford) searching for his missing girlfriend Sam in post-apocalyptic Glendale, California. Joined by a ragtag group of misfits including a pyromaniac 12-year-old Angelica and Josh’s former high school bully Wesley, now turned pacifist samurai, Josh tries to stay alive amongst the horde of Mad Max-style gangs (evil jocks, cheerleaders turned Amazon warriors), zombie-like creatures called Ghoulies, and everything else this brave new world throws at him”

blog.name: super-hero-confessions
blog.title: Super-Hero-Confessions
blog.description:
Super-hero-confessions is a blog where you can submit your confessions/personal opinions about any of the super hero movies, comics, television shows, cartoons, etc.

The confessions that are posted are those that are submitted; not the opinions of the blog owners. All the confessions will be anonymous when posted. Feel free to submit photos along with your confession if you would like as well.

If you want us to see a post tag it with either #superheroconfessions or #superhero confessions

blog.description: fighterxaos place for art and media specific posts. I like giant robots obviously. I write comics. I'm also an artist. Anything that's my art will be tagged appropriately. If you want a commission send a message

summary: Hasbro recently revealed official images for the Marvel Legends releases they revealed at 2018 Paris Comic-Con. The new reveals...
body:
Hasbro recently revealed official images for the Marvel Legends releases they revealed at 2018 Paris Comic-Con. The new reveals include several figures that fill out the previously announced build-a-figure waves. The newly revealed figures are set to release in Spring 2019.

The new reveals include:

Kree Sentry Build-a-Figure Wave

  • Grey Gargoyle 
  • Genis-Vell

Avengers Build-a-Figure Wave

  • Classic Loki

Adding to previous reveals we’ve seen the waves are as follows:

Kree Sentry Build-a-Figure Wave

  • Captain Marvel (MCU)
  • Skrull Commander Talos (MCU)
  • Nick Fury (MCU)
  • Genis-Vell
  • Kree Sentry (MCU)
  • Grey Gargoyle 
  • TBA

Avengers Build-a-Figure Wave

  • Hercules
  • Living Laser
  • Nighthawk
  • Beta Ray Bill
  • Ebony Maw
  • Corvus Glaive
  • Classic Loki

That’s it for the reveals for 2018 Paris Con, however stay tuned for the upcoming reveals at MCM 2018. 

Source: Hasbro

2018 Paris Comic Con: Marvel Legends Revealed

Hasbro recently revealed official images for the Marvel Legends releases they revealed at 2018 Paris Comic-Con. 

2018 Paris Comic Con: Marvel Legends Revealed Hasbro recently revealed official images for the Marvel Legends releases they revealed at 2018 Paris Comic-Con.

summary:
Idea: you aren’t feeling too great and Steve doesn’t make it any better
Paring: Steve Rogers x Reader 
Word count:...
body:
Too Far Part 2

 Idea: you aren’t feeling too great and Steve doesn’t make it any better

Paring: Steve Rogers x Reader 

Word count: 556

Genre/Warnings: fluff, some angst?, hospital scene, mild swearing.

A/N: Wow! actually posting something lmao. This is just the second part of my first imagine find that here

PART 1

(gif from Pinterest again) 

 “Y/N I-I’m sorry, I-I di-did this, I pushed yo-you to hard…” Steve’s voice could be heard around you, along with the dull beep of a machine. You roughly knew where you were. A hospital. Just what you needed, mentally rolling your eyes. Taking in a deep breath, you felt a hand clasped around yours, most likely Steve’s. Opening your eyes slowly trying to adjust to the sudden change in brightness, looking down at Steve he was to put it politely. A mess. You were a bit pissed from the last heated conversation if you could call it that, but there was not really a point in dwelling on it as you knew Steve would not forget this. Most likely to be saying sorry for the rest of his life. Smiling at the thought, you grasped his hand notifying him of your wake.

“Y/N?…” Steve questioned worriedly.

“What did I miss?” you said tiredly, making Steve smile at your effort to make light of this situation.

“Not a lot. I-I don’t know where to start, God I’m such an idiot-” you held up your hand silencing Steve. 

“Piss off.” Steve rose his eyebrow at your language. 

“Y/N the doctor said you couldn’t have slept in at least 3 days, let alone the fact that you were severely dehydrated.” He spoke caringly towards you.

“Was that your fault? No, I’m the one that decided that work was more important, don’t you dare blame yourself,” you warned him. 

“But I made you work non-stop. Thinking you were messing about.” Steve countered.

“Listen let's not argue, It was my fault and also yours, maybe 80 per cent your fault…” you said laughing towards Steve, who couldn’t help but smile at you. 

“You scared me Y/N… I-I really didn’t know what to do…” He said quietly towards you.

“Hey, it’s alright see I’m fine, good as new,” you said trying to cheer up the situation.

“It could’ve been worse…I-” You cupped Steves face into your hands, staring right into his eyes. 

“I’m here it wasn't that bad, with the job we do we can’t afford to be worrying if it could’ve been worse. We are both here and that’s all that matters.” You weren't a big crier but at this moment a few tears escaped down your face. Feeling Steve’s thumb swipe under your eye, letting out a small laugh smiling up at Steve, both of you leaning in closer to one another.

Your lips touched slowly, a sweet loving kiss, warm and gentle matching his personality. 

“Well, well what do we have here?” The two of you broke off your loving moment to see your rather annoying teammates all crowding around the door. You saw Bucky hand Sam some cash, probably some bet they had on they always do.

“Nice to see your okay Y/N, glad that Steve could aid you on your recovery,” Tony winked at you. 

“Looks like we should leave the two lovebirds alone,” Sam spoke up from the back, only to receive a pat on the back from Bucky who was laughing. The team said their goodbyes and left you and Steve alone again.

Looking at the beautifully annoying man on your left, the two of you burst out laughing. Spending the rest of the day watching crappy re-runs and eating junk in each other’s arms.

a/n: that was cute. Any requests please message, my inbox is open! xx

Tags: @bluepineforests @coralmakercollectorsworld

@nothernlights19

Just what you needed, mentally rolling your eyes. Taking in a deep breath, you felt a hand clasped around yours, most likely Steve’s. Opening your eyes slowly trying to adjust to the sudden change in brightness, looking down at Steve he was to put it politely. A mess. You were a bit pissed from the last heated conversation if you could call it that, but there was not really a point in dwelling on it as you knew Steve would not forget this. Most likely to be saying sorry for the rest of his life. Smiling at the thought, you grasped his hand notifying him of your wake.

“Y/N?…” Steve questioned worriedly.

“What did I miss?” you said tiredly, making Steve smile at your effort to make light of this situation.

“Not a lot. I-I don’t know where to start, God I’m such an idiot-” you held up your hand silencing Steve. 

“Piss off.” Steve rose his eyebrow at your language. 

“Y/N the doctor said you couldn’t have slept in at least 3 days, let alone the fact that you were severely dehydrated.” He spoke caringly towards you.

“Was that your fault? No, I’m the one that decided that work was more important, don’t you dare blame yourself,” you warned him. 

“But I made you work non-stop. Thinking you were messing about.” Steve countered.

“Listen let's not argue, It was my fault and also yours, maybe 80 per cent your fault…” you said laughing towards Steve, who couldn’t help but smile at you. 

“You scared me Y/N… I-I really didn’t know what to do…” He said quietly towards you.

“Hey, it’s alright see I’m fine, good as new,” you said trying to cheer up the situation.

“It could’ve been worse…I-” You cupped Steves face into your hands, staring right into his eyes. 

“I’m here it wasn't that bad, with the job we do we can’t afford to be worrying if it could’ve been worse. We are both here and that’s all that matters.” You weren't a big crier but at this moment a few tears escaped down your face. Feeling Steve’s thumb swipe under your eye, letting out a small laugh smiling up at Steve, both of you leaning in closer to one another.

Your lips touched slowly, a sweet loving kiss, warm and gentle matching his personality. 

“Well, well what do we have here?” The two of you broke off your loving moment to see your rather annoying teammates all crowding around the door. You saw Bucky hand Sam some cash, probably some bet they had on they always do.

“Nice to see your okay Y/N, glad that Steve could aid you on your recovery,” Tony winked at you. 

“Looks like we should leave the two lovebirds alone,” Sam spoke up from the back, only to receive a pat on the back from Bucky who was laughing. The team said their goodbyes and left you and Steve alone again.

Looking at the beautifully annoying man on your left, the two of you burst out laughing. Spending the rest of the day watching crappy re-runs and eating junk in each other’s arms.

a/n: that was cute. Any requests please message, my inbox is open! xx

Tags: @bluepineforests @coralmakercollectorsworld

@nothernlights19
trail.content:

Paring: Steve Rogers x Reader 

Word count: 556

Genre/Warnings: fluff, some angst?, hospital scene, mild swearing.

A/N: Wow! actually posting something lmao. This is just the second part of my first imagine find that here
